descriptions.content: bskul ba, bskul tshig, phrin las bskul ba, thugs rje [thugs rje la, thugs rje’i] bskul ba. Part of the four-fold group “bskang ‘phrin bstod bskul” = appeasing, enjoining, praise and inciting. Ex: Bka’ srung rnams kyi thugs dam rgyud nas bskul tshig (W10400), Dpal ldan lha mo drag po’i ‘phrin las bskul ba (W10728), Tsong kha pa la gsol ba ‘debs thugs rje bskul ba (W1958), Bdag nyid la bskul ba gser lcags rin chen gyi 'bras bu can (W29104), Rang gzhan chos la bskul ba (W6479).
